## Description {#details}

This file defines the main interface for hardware event listeners.

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entry per register file.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Number of micro opcodes dispatched.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This field is often set to the total number of micro-opcodes specified by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the instruction descriptor of IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only exception is when IR declares a number of micro opcodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which exceeds the processor DispatchWidth, and - by construction - it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// requires multiple cycles to be fully dispatched. In that particular case,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the dispatch logic would generate more than one dispatch event (one per</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cycle), and each event would declare how many micro opcodes are effectively</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// been dispatched to the schedulers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructiondispatchedevent/#a221e4b57bdb6000f98ebff74d1d073ba"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructiondispatchedevent/#a221e4b57bdb6000f98ebff74d1d073ba">MicroOpcodes</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructionretiredevent"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructionretiredevent/#a11d7f5edac24c0496068791fa4999ba0">HWInstructionRetiredEvent</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructionevent/#a171b37ee53c5f563af010cdc3ebb47a3">HWInstructionEvent</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructionevent/#a171b37ee53c5f563af010cdc3ebb47a3">HWInstructionEvent</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructionevent/#a171b37ee53c5f563af010cdc3ebb47a3">HWInstructionEvent</a>::<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructionevent/#a8169c917f54cc2624dd536acdc5c5e52a8de8de8d10772f11d7f1388dc019dd30">Retired</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwinstructionevent/#a17c3610b731525a11cec3d4e9472291c">IR</a>),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Number of register writes that have been architecturally committed. There</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is one entry per register file.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A HWPressureEvent describes an increase in backend pressure caused by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the presence of data dependencies or unavailability of pipeline resources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent/#a5372282b8b63061ee40dc07f912e3f80">HWPressureEvent</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent/#adfb26ed742fb9cba9a339e39472afdbaa2d558492a78876e05f930cde529cdb7c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent/#adfb26ed742fb9cba9a339e39472afdbaa2d558492a78876e05f930cde529cdb7c">INVALID</a> = 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scheduler was unable to issue all the ready instructions because some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pipeline resources were unavailable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent/#adfb26ed742fb9cba9a339e39472afdbaa9ab49687d8ecc311352f6bee677180c4"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent/#adfb26ed742fb9cba9a339e39472afdbaa9ab49687d8ecc311352f6bee677180c4">RESOURCES</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instructions could not be issued because of register data dependencies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent/#adfb26ed742fb9cba9a339e39472afdbaa2d42b099c4456a336bb28534905732fb"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hwpressureevent/#adfb26ed742fb9cba9a339e39472afdbaa2d42b099c4456a336bb28534905732fb">REGISTER&#95;DEPS</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instructions could not be issued because of memory dependencies.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generic events generated by the pipeline.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hweventlistener/#a2b0f7fd061b8257443f9ec9b5d97ad92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/hweventlistener/#a2b0f7fd061b8257443f9ec9b5d97ad92">onCycleBegin</a>() &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
